item.title: Mages of Mystralia
item.description: I worked at Borealys Games, an independent video game studio, from May 2016 until November 2017. I mostly worked on Mages of Mystralia but I also worked on other unannounced/cancelled projects. We were two/three programmers working on Mages of Mystralia (Anthony Demange as lead programmer and Vincent Bilodeau as graphics programmer). On Mages of Mystralia, I touched almost everything given the small size of the team but I focused specifically on these parts of the game:
